title: Increase in critical reporting in China

content.question: Which of the following statements accurately describes changes in the Chinese media in the past twenty years?

choices.label: There has been a rapid decline in the number and types of media outlets.
There has been a decline in the diversity of topics permitted for public discussion.
There has been privatization of most media outlets.
There has been a continuation of monolithic univocal programming at the national level.
There has been an increase in investigative reporting.

content.answer: There has been an increase in investigative reporting.
